title: Death's Dance on Fiora?
body:
My current build for Fiora looks something like:
Titanic>Boots>Black Cleaver>Ravenous(Swap with Titanic)>BT>Spirit Visage>Deadman's Plate.
Should I drop Deadman's cus of its nerf this patch and replace it with Death's Dance or keep it and swap BT for Death's Dancer?

replies.body: If I'm ahead, (really ahead), I go for Ravenous Hydra -> Bloodthirster -> Death's Dance. This way you have 50% lifesteal. Pretty damn fun.

DMP wasn't touched this patch. All of Fiora's physical damage comes from basic attacks or on-hit, so Death's Dance has no advantage with healing. The CDR isn't necessary since you'll already be capped if you have the right runes and BT gives more AD I believe, plus the shield. So Death's Dance isn't worth it on Fiora unless you're doing some mega-heal build.
